title: How Can I Connect GitLab and Share Design Tokens with My Team
content: How can I connect GitLab and share design tokens with my team? - The Design System Guide Close design tokens # How can I connect GitLab and share design tokens with my team? Romina Kavcic If you want to share design tokens with your team in GitLab, you can give team members the 'reporter' role, which provides them with read-only access to your repository. 🔗 Read more on Gitlab Permission and roles page. [https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/user/permissions.html] 🔗 PS. It is also possible to do this on GitHub. [https://docs.github.com/en/get-started/learning-about-github/access-permissions-on-github] Next question Design Systems for Figma Published on: Oct 20, 2024 Updated: Updated: Oct 21, 2024 ## Latest additions Glossary I need checklists for creating new Figma components Top 15 Design Systems in 2024 Design system podcasts Design systems using Web Components I'm Romina Kavcic. I coach design teams on implementing design systems, optimizing design processes, and developing design strategy. I'm Romina Kavcic. I coach design teams on implementing design systems, optimizing design processes, and developing design strategy. chunks.text: How can I connect GitLab and share design tokens with my team? - The Design System Guide Close design tokens # How can I connect GitLab and share design tokens with my team? Romina Kavcic If you want to share design tokens with your team in GitLab, you can give team members the 'reporter' role, which provides them with read-only access to your repository. 🔗 Read more on Gitlab Permission and roles page. [https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/user/permissions.html] 🔗 PS. It is also possible to do this on GitHub.
